title: New Names, New Jerseys: 2025 Rebrands for XDS Astana and Picnic-PostNL, Fresh Kits for Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe and UAE Emirates
content:
Chinese mega-sponsor XDS officially joins WorldTour, online supermarket Picnic partners Dutch team, Pogačar and Roglič get new kits.

Read the full article at New Names, New Jerseys: 2025 Rebrands for XDS Astana and Picnic-PostNL, Fresh Kits for Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe and UAE Emirates on Velo.
author: sstokes
